title: NoteCode
description: A code-sharing app built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB, featuring a Monaco editor.

title: Drum Machine
description: A responsive drum pad app built with React, featuring keyboard control and adjustable volume.

title: Random Quote Machine
description: A React app that displays random quotes with dynamic color themes and Twitter sharing.

title: Javascript Calculator
description: A simple, responsive calculator built with React, supporting basic arithmetic operations.

title: Markdown Previewer
description: A live React app that converts GitHub-flavored Markdown to HTML in real-time.

title: Heat Map
description: A D3.js-based data visualization showing global temperature variations over time using a responsive heatmap.
